attributes.action: apply pressure to the manufacturers of cars to produce and make avaliable for purchase to the general public electric vehicles with a top speed of more than 70mph, a range of more than 200 miles and the facility to charge at home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Powerful elements in the oil and automobile industries want you to stay addicted to oil because it suits their profit margins.  In today's climate of corporate pro-green images they must be seen to be offering greener alternatives, the problem is most are dangled out of our reach (H fuel cell) or 'hybrid' cars which although are cleaner do still emit CO2.  Proven EV technology is avaliable today but has been suppressed, demand it!
